actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to authorize certain programs and activities of the government of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Commissioner of the District of Columbia to carry out specified programs and activities of the government of the District of Columbia. Authorizes appropriations to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize certain programs and activities of the government of the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
